availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David A Davis (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Davis. Father of Marinda E. Davis and Wesley C. Davis. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 789.
Find A Grave, "David A. Davis (c1827-Dec 22, 1901)," Memorial #59240111, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59240111 (accessed April 23, 2020).
